hero.heading: Your daily hair boost
hero.subheading: Hr² is your all-in-one hair supplement - clinically tested for daily support of hair roots, scalp, and nutrient supply. Scientifically developed, trusted by a global community.
hero.cta_quiz: Take the quiz for a personalized plan
hero.clinicians_body: Science-backed. Developed by leading medical experts.

aria.quiz_start: Start quiz for a personalized plan

causes.heading: YOUR HAIR LOSS DOESN'T HAVE TO BE LEFT TO CHANCE.
causes.subheading: Men's hair thins for more than one reason. And addressing multiple causes is exactly what Hr² was designed to do.
causes.caption: The body needs nutrients to support a healthy hair growth cycle. These nutrients can be reduced, for example by an unbalanced diet, which can affect hair strength and overall health.

stress.title: STRESS
stress.description: Chronic stress can disrupt healthy hair cycles and influence shedding patterns.

hormones.title: HORMONES
hormones.description: Hormonal signaling can affect follicle sensitivity and contribute to thinning over time.

dht.title: DHT
dht.description: Sleep, activity, and habits influence recovery and the environment hair needs to grow.

nutrition.title: NUTRITION
nutrition.description: Nutrient deficiencies that can arise from diet or an unbalanced gut microbiome.

aging.title: AGING
aging.description: As we age, growth phases can become shorter, making it harder to maintain hair density.

partners.kicker: Formulated by scientists from these institutions

ingredients.heading: THE AWARD-WINNING PRECISION BLEND OF INGREDIENTS.

anagain.name: Anagain
anagain.description: A plant-based pea shoot extract that supports hair root activity and promotes healthy hair growth.<sup>4</sup>

sawpalmetto.name: Saw Palmetto Extract
sawpalmetto.description: A botanical extract that supports factors linked to maintaining fuller hair.<sup>4</sup>

pomegranate.name: Pomegranate Extract
pomegranate.description: A polyphenol-rich extract with antioxidant properties that supports protection from oxidative stress.<sup>4</sup>

ashwagandha.name: Ashwagandha
ashwagandha.description: An adaptogen that supports stress balance, an important factor for healthy hair cycles.<sup>4</sup>

lcysteine.name: L-Cysteine
lcysteine.description: An amino acid that serves as a building block of keratin and supports natural hair structure.<sup>4</sup>

llysine.name: L-Lysine
llysine.description: An essential amino acid involved in building structural proteins.<sup>4</sup>

zinc.name: Zinc
zinc.description: Zinc contributes to the maintenance of normal hair and nails.<sup>4</sup>

biotin.name: Biotin
biotin.description: Biotin contributes to the maintenance of normal hair and skin.<sup>4</sup>

clinical.heading: Clinical testing isn't an extra – it's our standard.
clinical.footer: Hair health innovations you can trust – powered by industry-leading hair measurement.

community.heading: Clinically tested, lived by real people
community.subheading: Hear from our community how Hr² has changed their daily routine.

aaron.subtitle: Hr² MEMBER SINCE 2025
aaron.quote: I did not want something that makes quick promises and then, scientifically speaking, does not really deliver. Hr² feels more like a long-term decision, with ingredients specifically chosen to support hair growth. After a few months, my hair feels more resilient and I trust that I am actively doing something about hair loss.

lukas.subtitle: Hr² MEMBER SINCE 2025
lukas.quote: During stressful phases, my hair was always the first thing that showed something was off. Hr² feels like a small daily reset. I feel supported and do not have to worry about it all the time.

patrick.subtitle: Hr² MEMBER SINCE 2025
patrick.quote: I work and train hard, and that effort and stress have downsides too. At some point I realized I had neglected one important area: my hair. Since taking Hr², I have moved past that uneasy feeling.

faq.heading: You have questions, we have answers
faq.subheading: Can't find what you're looking for? Visit our

q1.question: What is Hr²?
q1.answer: Hr² is a daily nutrient boost with over 70 high-quality ingredients, including vitamins, minerals, plant compounds, and bacterial cultures. Developed by experts, science-backed, and recommended by high performers worldwide.

q2.question: Will Hr² work for my hair type?
q2.answer: Hr² is designed for daily, long-term support of hair health, regardless of hair type or texture. Because causes of hair loss and thinning vary, results can differ from person to person.

q3.question: Does it work for women and men?
q3.answer: Yes. Hr² is developed for women and men and supports hair health regardless of gender.

q4.question: Does Hr² contain drugs?
q4.answer: No. Hr² is a dietary supplement and contains no pharmaceutical drugs.

q5.question: I know some hair-growth treatments have side effects. Does that apply to Hr²?
q5.answer: Hr² is generally well tolerated as a dietary supplement. As with any supplement, individual sensitivities can occur.

q6.question: Is there a risk that Hr² lowers libido?
q6.answer: Hr² contains no pharmaceutical drugs and is not designed to interfere with hormonal balance.

footer.contact_blurb: Send us an email - we are happy to help.
footer.disclaimer: *Note: The content on this website is for informational purposes only and does not replace medical advice. Supplements are not a substitute for a balanced diet.

product_page.subtitle: Your daily, clinically backed hair support routine.
product_page.description: Hr² is a daily supplement for hair health, developed with clinically studied ingredients including Anagain, saw palmetto extract, and biotin.
product_page.bio_text: Selected ingredients, optimized dosages, and combinations designed to support absorption and everyday effectiveness.
product_page.proven_title: Clinically tested ingredients. Backed by science.
product_page.proven_desc_1: Every active ingredient in Hr² has been studied in clinical trials for its effectiveness in supporting hair health.
product_page.proven_desc_2: Dosages and nutrient combinations calibrated for maximum bioavailability and absorption in your body.
product_page.proven_desc_3: No prescription drugs like finasteride or minoxidil — only natural, well-tolerated ingredients.
product_page.proven_desc_4: Free from ingredients linked to sexual side effects — designed with your overall wellbeing in mind.
product_page.timeline_intro: Hr² is designed for daily use, working with your body to support healthy hair growth and maintain results long-term.*
product_page.tl_month1_desc: Your body begins absorbing the key micronutrients. The foundation for healthy hair follicles is being built.*
product_page.tl_month3_desc: Less hair shedding in daily life, stronger hair structure, and first visible improvements in hair density.*
product_page.tl_month6_desc: The full effect of the ingredients unfolds. Consistent daily use supports long-term maintenance of results.*
product_page.faq_a1: Hr² is a daily supplement designed to support hair health with a comprehensive ingredient blend.
product_page.faq_q2: Is Hr² for women and men?
product_page.faq_a2: Yes. Hr² is designed for both women and men.
product_page.faq_q3: How long until I notice changes?
product_page.faq_a3: Most people evaluate progress over 3-6 months of consistent use.
product_page.faq_a4: No. Hr² is a dietary supplement and contains no pharmaceutical drugs.
product_page.faq_q5: Can I take Hr² with other supplements?
product_page.faq_a5: In many cases yes, but check overlapping nutrients and consult a professional if unsure.
product_page.faq_q6: Where can I learn more about ingredients and evidence?
product_page.delivery_text: Free shipping, cancel anytime, and a 30-day money-back guarantee.
